com.aldebaran.qi.helper.proxies

Class ALInfrared

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.aldebaran.qi.helper.ALProxy
      • com.aldebaran.qi.helper.proxies.ALInfrared

  • public class ALInfrared
extends ALProxy
    This module works with Linux Infrared Remote Control (LIRC) in order to emit/receive IR remotes keys or to emit/receive IR information to/from an other Nao.
    See Also:
    NAOqi APIs for ALInfrared

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class com.aldebaran.qi.helper.ALProxy

      • wait

        public java.lang.Boolean wait(java.lang.Integer id,
                              java.lang.Integer timeoutPeriod)
                       throws CallError,
                              java.lang.InterruptedException
        Wait for the end of a long running method that was called using 'post'
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the method that was returned when calling the method using 'post'
        timeoutPeriod - The timeout period in ms. To wait indefinately, use a timeoutPeriod of zero.
        Returns:
        True if the timeout period terminated. False if the method returned.
        Throws:
        CallError
        java.lang.InterruptedException
